verses.kjv: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,
verses.ct: Remind the believers to submit to rulers and authorities, to follow those in government, and to be prepared for any kind of good work.

verses.kjv: To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.
verses.ct: They should not slander anyone, avoid quarreling, and instead be considerate, showing genuine humility toward everyone.

verses.kjv: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.
verses.ct: After all, we ourselves used to be foolish, disobedient, and misled. We were enslaved by all kinds of desires and pleasures, spending our lives in bitterness and jealousy — despised by others and despising each other.

verses.kjv: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,
verses.ct: But when the kindness and love for humanity of God our Savior was revealed,

verses.kjv: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
verses.ct: he saved us — not because of any righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He saved us through the cleansing of rebirth and the renewal that comes from the Holy Spirit,

verses.kjv: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;
verses.ct: which he poured out on us generously through Jesus Christ our Savior,

verses.kjv: That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.
verses.ct: so that, having been declared righteous by his grace, we would become heirs with the confident expectation of eternal life.

verses.kjv: This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.
verses.ct: This statement is trustworthy, and I want you to emphasize these things consistently, so that those who have put their trust in God will devote themselves to doing good. These things are beneficial and valuable for everyone.

verses.kjv: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.
verses.ct: But stay away from pointless debates, arguments about genealogies, and disputes and fights over the law, because they accomplish nothing and are a waste of time.

verses.kjv: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;
verses.ct: If someone is causing division, warn them once, then warn them a second time. After that, have nothing more to do with them.

verses.kjv: Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.
verses.ct: You can be sure that a person like that has become twisted and keeps on sinning — they are self-condemned.

verses.kjv: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.
verses.ct: Once I send Artemas or Tychicus to you, do your best to come to me at Nicopolis, because I've decided to spend the winter there.

verses.kjv: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.
verses.ct: Make every effort to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey, and make sure they have everything they need.

verses.kjv: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.
verses.ct: Our people must also learn to commit themselves to doing good in order to meet urgent needs, so that their lives won't be unproductive.

verses.kjv: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.
verses.ct: Everyone here with me sends their greetings. Give our greetings to those who love us because of our shared faith. Grace be with all of you. Amen.
